title: Disconnect has no confirmation dialog which potentially may lead to bad consequences
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
I have been using mRemoteNG for years. Currently I am using mRemoteNG officially stable version 1.76.20 on Windows 10.
    1. Open some SSH connection to e.g. Linux computer. 
    2. Right button click on connection tab and select Disconnect. Problem appears. I have clicked this by mistake wanting to click Duplicate Tab (both start with letter D). Clicking Disconnect is potentially very dangerous action and I thing in this case confirmation dialog should appear with question: "Do you want to d...
